definition: to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
to supervise and urge completion of a task/to urge on
lit. knees pressed close/intimate/seated side by side/in close contact

sentences.english: Grasping the "Five Constructions", Promoting the "Three Services", Setting up Good Image.
sentences.chinese: 抓“五项建设”，促“三个服务”，树良好形象。

sentences.english: Going among the masses to promote harmony requires carrying forward the spirit of earthquake relief work.
sentences.chinese: “深入群众促和谐”要弘扬汶川抗震救灾精神。

sentences.english: Actually a spore is an end product of a series of enzymatic processes.
sentences.chinese: 实际上一个芽孢是一系列酶促过程的最终产物。

sentences.english: According to modern research, velvet antler has shown gonadotropic activity.
sentences.chinese: 根据现代医学的研究表明鹿茸具有促性腺作用。

sentences.english: Exosomes can partake in both pro- and anti-tumor functions.
sentences.chinese: 外泌体同时参与促肿瘤和抗肿瘤两种功能。

sentences.english: But this EGF-mediated motility could be partly inhibited by fulvestrant pretreatment.
sentences.chinese: 但EGF的促增殖作用能够被氟维司群部分阻断。

sentences.english: In overseas it is widely used as antibiotic growth promoter.
sentences.chinese: 在国外被广泛用作促生长剂。

sentences.english: Antibacterial Auxogen, no-drug resistance, and safety to use.
sentences.chinese: 抗菌促生长剂，无抗药性，使用安全。

sentences.english: This type of invasive activity is normally associated with strong acting cancer-promoting genes.
sentences.chinese: 这种入侵行为正常情况下都与强烈促癌基因相关。

sentences.english: A quick blood test can assess your level of thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH).
sentences.chinese: 验血就能显示你促甲状腺激素的指数。

sentences.english: Sweetens to package spread the bone fracture place, promotes to heal.
sentences.chinese: 加糖包敷骨折处，促愈合。

sentences.english: The research about chiral separation of medicine by enzyme catalysis in organic solven…
sentences.chinese: 本文将对有机相中手性药物的酶促拆分研究进行综述。

sentences.english: To elucidate the mechanisms of yeast extraction and Echlonia Kurome Okum water extraction to stimulate the growth of Escherichia coli.
sentences.chinese: 研究海带水提液和酵母提取物促大肠杆菌生长的机理。

sentences.english: The sorbefacient prokinetic drug (prepulsid) can improve the function of gastric power, but the lever of motilin no change.
sentences.chinese: 促动力药物可改善胃动力异常，但胃动素水平无变化。

sentences.english: Celebrating Hongkong Return Motherland, Promoting Jingjiu Prosperity, Talking about Remote Sensing Application.
sentences.chinese: 庆香港回归，促京九繁荣，话遥感应用。

sentences.english: The biochemical era in the study of gastrin was initiated.
sentences.chinese: 研究促胃液素的生物化学时代开始了。

definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters
to be effective over an extended period
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
